title: Skier Breezy Johnson - mindset and comeback after serious injury
description: The U.S. skier Breezy Johnson is one of the most resilient athletes in international competition. The injuries she has suffered have been severe and career threatening. A fractured leg and several knee ligament issues may have ended her career. Instead, she kept going. Breezy is in the form of her life with four world cup podium finishes in downhill ahead of the world championships in the legendary Italian resort of Cortina. She talks cliff jumping, facing your fear, and why being brave is just a state of mind.
